tool_description: Given a natural language text description of a protein,  this tool searches the protein sequence database to retrieve most relevant proteins.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The natural language text description of a protein.
required_parameters.example: This protein is a transcription factor that regulates the expression of genes involved in cell cycle progression.

required_parameters.name: database
required_parameters.description: The specific database to search for the protein sequences.

return_values.name: protein_sequence
return_values.description: A string representing the amino acid sequence of the protein.
